flavor: A spirit unmoved by elemental impetus, destined to wander aimlessly.
name: Lost Spirit

effect: **On Enter:** Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.
effect_raw: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.
flavor: “This beautiful world we have been tasked to save... It carries such a stench of smoke and ash.”
name: Lorraine, Wandering Warrior

rule.description: You still need to pay the costs of the weapon. Most of the time, this cost will be 0. However, if an effect modifies the cost of the card, this cost must be paid. In addition, if the selected card has an additional cost of materialization, that cost must also be paid.

effect_html: On Enter: Materialize a weapon card with memory cost 0 from your material deck.

effect:
**Lorraine Lineage** *(Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)*

**On Enter:** Until end of turn, CARDNAME's attacks get +2 [POWER] and gain "**On Kill:** Draw a card."
effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)

On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 POWER and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."
name: Lorraine, Blademaster

rule.description: With the On Enter effect, Lorraine's attacks get the additional effects, not Lorraine herself. This means that Lorraine still needs a weapon or attack card in order to declare attacks because she does not have an attack stat.

effect_html: Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

editions.flavor: The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Each player draws a card.
effect_raw: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.
flavor: Glittering trinkets, coins, and treasures. Plenty enough to be shared among friend and foe alike.
name: Bauble of Abundance
effect_html: Banish Bauble of Abundance: Each player draws a card.

editions.flavor:
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor:
"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death's door."
— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa
name: Life Essence Amulet
effect_html: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.

effect: [Class Bonus] **On Enter:** Target ally you control gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 POWER until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: An ornate and pristine sword used ceremoniously with great effect, though dull of edge.
name: Ornamental Greatsword
effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: Target ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

effect: [Class Bonus] **On Attack:** **Glimpse 2**. *(To **glimpse**, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: Even a simple enchantment grants great advantage.
name: Seer's Sword
effect_html: Class Bonus On Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Up to one target Dagger or Sword weapon you control gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn. Draw a card.
effect_raw: Banish Sharpening Stone: Up to one target Dagger or Sword weapon you control gets +1 POWER until end of turn. Draw a card.
flavor: Only neglect begets a dulled edge.
name: Sharpening Stone
effect_html: Banish Sharpening Stone: Up to one target Dagger or Sword weapon you control gets +1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

effect: [Class Bonus] CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER]. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Warrior's Longsword gets +1 POWER. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A dependable sword made of sturdy steel with an edge honed enough to pierce most defenses. A warrior's true companion.
name: Warrior's Longsword
effect_html: Class Bonus Warrior's Longsword gets +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.effect: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 [POWER].
editions.effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 POWER.
editions.flavor: Their passion and fervor on the battlefield inspire fellow warriors to ascend in strength.
editions.effect_html: Class Bonus Level 2+ Other allies and weapons you control get +1.

effect: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 [POWER]. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 POWER. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
flavor: Standards raised behind capable leaders often instill courage in those that march astride.
name: Banner Knight
effect_html: Class Bonus Level 2+ Other allies and weapons you control get +1. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)

effect:
CARDNAME enters the field rested.

[Class Bonus] **Intercept** *(Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw:
Crusader of Aesa enters the field rested.

[Class Bonus] Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
name: Crusader of Aesa
effect_html: Crusader of Aesa enters the field rested.Class Bonus Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.flavor: Fearsome in battle and resolute in defense, these knights serve faithfully as Camelot's elite bastion.

effect: [Class Bonus] **Intercept** *(Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: A knight whose reputation precedes them. They raise their sword for noble purpose.
name: Esteemed Knight
effect_html: Class Bonus Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.flavor: The emperor's gates are well-watched with these soldiers' dutiful eyes and faithful hearts.
Important duties among front-line soldiers include the occasional instruction of trainees at the academy.

effect: **Floating Memory** *(While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)*
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: “Advance! Keep them away from the gates until reinforcements arrive!”
name: Honorable Vanguard
effect_html: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.flavor: Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.
Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.

effect:
This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.

Allies you control get +1 [POWER] until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.

Allies you control get +1 POWER until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.
flavor:
"Aesans, rally to me! Camelot will not fall!" 
— Lorraine Allard
name: Inspiring Call
effect_html: This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.

effect: [Class Bonus] As long as you have exactly one card in your memory, CARDNAME gets +2 [POWER]￰. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] As long as you have exactly one card in your memory, Opening Cut gets +2 POWER￰. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: Fair fights only exist within honorable duels. In true battle, the quickest to act is usually the victor.
name: Opening Cut
effect_html: Class Bonus As long as you have exactly one card in your memory, Opening Cut gets +2￰. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

editions.flavor: Sometimes the best solution is straight forward.

flavor: Sometimes the simplest tactic is the most effective.
name: Reckless Slash

editions.flavor:
"This is a very good and helpful pony!"
—Silvie Heartsong

effect: **On Enter:** Another target ally you control gets +2 [POWER] until end of turn.
effect_raw: On Enter: Another target ally you control gets +2 POWER until end of turn.
flavor: Bonded and trained, these majestic creatures offer warriors powerful advantages in battle.
name: Trusty Steed
effect_html: On Enter: Another target ally you control gets +2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The collapse of the reigning dynasty has left a power vacuum, open for any warlord or general to grasp.
"I will carve out my legacy into Aesan soil with steel. Let this bloodshed sate this endless hunger for war."

effect: **Floating Memory** *(While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)*
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: The recent strife and turmoil within Aesa has hardened even the greenest of recruits.
name: Veteran Soldier
effect_html: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.flavor: Iron gleams bright amidst the warring kingdoms.

effect: [Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a **durability** counter on target weapon you control. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a durability counter on target weapon you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: The forges burn bright as war dawns on Cambria.
name: Weaponsmith
effect_html: Class Bonus At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a durability counter on target weapon you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
